sentences.en: Tropical storm Marco is pushing northward up Florida's coast.
sentences.cn: 热带风暴“马可”正沿着佛罗里达海岸向北推进。

sentences.en: The northward journey from Jalalabad was no more than 120 miles.
sentences.cn: 从贾拉拉巴德向北的行程不超过120英里。

sentences.en: This causes the warm surface waters of the Gulf Stream to be pulled northward.
sentences.cn: 这导致墨西哥湾暖流的地表水被拉向北面。
